nodes.bodyText:
@0blivious , why you escaping quotes ?
it is ok, but it works now well for javadoc and website , the less quotes the better to my mind .
This was going on in the other PRs as well. If we wish to enforce one over the other, than we should add it as part of a UT or checkstyle.
How is this an overridden method?
Please use some name of Object class
@romani Do we really need message override? It is not in the description and the message is not that drastic different than the default.
Let's keep it, not sure why it is there, Git history might able to answer.
